content:
PlayRecordCallback Delegate

Definition

This delegate is not used. For an example of enumerating the records of a metafile, see stem.Drawing.Graphics.EnumerateMetafile*.

In this Article

public delegate void PlayRecordCallback(EmfPlusRecordType recordType, int flags, int dataSize, IntPtr recordData);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
PlayRecordCallback
